programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Egypt: Survivors in the Sands

programme.title: The New Detectives: Murder By Numbers

programme.title: The New Detectives: Forsaken Trust

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of aspiring chefs through a series of tough challenges. The teams meet new members before heading into a team challenge in which they must prepare a tasting menu for a dog show.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams roll the dice to determine the ingredients for their next team challenge, while a contestant leaves due to an injury. The cooks cater for music legends during dinner service, including Stewart Copeland and Steven Tyler.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Following the departure of two contestants from the competition, those remaining are challenged to create Indian-inspired meals, with the winning team earning a day of pampering at a luxurious spa.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring chefs through tough challenges. The teams are challenged to a blind taste test. Dinner service is held in honour of a group of decorated firefighters.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Andromeda: The Fair Unknown

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In 1999, Kiwi engineer Aaron Hopa and his English colleague Robert Glazzard were murdered on board a survey ship in the Persian Gulf in.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Seeking Siegfried
programme.desc: Katikati man Siegfried Newman disappeared on February 25, 2008, after he had dropped his sons Thomas, 9, and Oliver, 7, at Pahoia School. Police carried out a three-day search but found no sign of him.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Sallie-Anne Huckstepp and Juanita Nielsen were iconic figures in the shadowy King’s Cross scene of the 1970s and 1980s. They lived dangerous lives – challenging the status quo of the period and met with mysterious and violent deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.desc: Crime Investigation Australia has conducted a major investigation which reveals the inside story of the Megan Kalajzich murder and the extraordinary police investigation which will rock the Harbour City's elite to the core.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Twice Bitten
programme.desc: Tensions are rife with Kane now living in the cottage with Stevie, and Sally staying in the big house with Nick and Tess.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: No Man's Land
programme.desc: A cattle muster goes horribly wrong for the women of Drovers Run. Nick is torn between his love for Tess, and his obligations to Sally.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Little White Lies
programme.desc: The women of Drovers Run take on the big boys of the sheep industry at the annual Wool Expo.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Rules of Disengagement
programme.desc: Jodi risks her life by driving for the injured Luke in a high-stakes drag race.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Once Were Heros
programme.desc: Dave risks his career to save a herd of mistreated horses. Jodi tries to stop Luke from gambling his car, with disastrous consequences for both of them.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Return of the Black
programme.desc: Jodi struggles to find a new career after being sacked from Drovers Run. Sandra risks her marriage and her property to get even with Harry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Garden State Asylum

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Pensacola Lighthouse
programme.desc: TAPS heads to the Florida Panhandle to investigate a notoriously haunted lighthouse with over a century's worth of paranormal reports.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: And Then There Were None
programme.desc: With four outlaws still on the lam, Dog sets out to bring 'em in. As day turns into night and with the darkness and the danger mounting, an undaunted Dog and team plan late night hits on the riskiest of locations--their targets' homes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In the southern interior of British Columbia, Penticton SAR lowers a stretcher team down a steep embankment to rescue an injured driver who was thrown from his car.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whiteout conditions critically delay Pemberton SAR’s search for a lost snowmobiler. And later, surviving an avalanche!

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue turns a missing out of bounds snowboarder into a crusader of mountain safety.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland and Nelson Search and Rescue risk avalanche threats to recover a ski fatality in the backcountry.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rings in the New Year with three back-to-back missions.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: White water rescue rookies in Nelson BC get a taste of reality when their swift-water training course becomes an actual mission, one they will never forget.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams go deep for a missing subject in the Upana cave system on Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In southeastern British Columbia, Nelson Search and Rescue is rescuing an overly curious canine who’s tumbled off a cliff.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent-Harrison Search and Rescue deal with darkness and death on a late night callout.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Back Seat of My Jeep
programme.desc: Bumping in the night in the back seat of his jeep has caused all our problems! Kelsey says Justin cheats, doesn’t pay bills and is always angry. Justin argues that she’s a liar and doesn’t help around the house ever.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasn’t so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Ruffians and Wrestlers
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt have an unpleasant confrontation with a group of skateboarding ruffians who don't want to give up their car. Froy and Sonia try to take a vehicle from the world's most volatile couple. Plus, Lou and Froy wind up in unknown territory.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monumental Changes
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Think, Adapt and Attack
programme.desc: Matt and Froy head to Texas to clear Froy's name, but things take a turn for the worse and Froy finds himself in more trouble than he can handle. Back in LA, Lou and Lyndah repo a car from a deceptive charity worker, and Lou is left to protect...

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Weren't Informed
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy end up on one of the weirdest repos they've ever encountered when a white cargo van unleashes a wave of workers. Then, Lou, Sonia, and Rob go green when they find they learn the Mercedes Benz they are after has been converted.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Big or Go Home
programme.desc: Fuming over Froy's departure, Matt loses his temper on a dominatrix and her client and packs his bags to return to LA.? Down two repo men, the pressure is on Ronnie and Carlos, who interrupts a couple in the middle of their less-than-holy matrimony.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Dune Buggy
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper-class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Baby
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joining the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: We Know Enough
programme.desc: Danni makes things clear for Preston where they stand in their relationship. (S4, ep15)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Look Closely
programme.desc: Sabrina realises that Bayo has a significant secret while Karen and Aaron draw closer. (S4,ep16)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Some Sort of Woman
programme.desc: Calvin finds himself in an uncomfortable situation with Que after a night of drinking. (S4, ep17)

programme.title: Run's House: Jo Jo's Graduation

programme.title: Run's House: Growing Up Is Hard To Do

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Manner House
programme.desc: Rev and Justine are both fed up with the boys' rude behavior. Justine decides to bring in a supernanny type person to teach the family the basics in social etiquette.

programme.title: Run's House: When Diggy Met Brittney
programme.desc: When Rev learns that Diggy's play date is actually with two girls he believes that Diggy must have a crush on one of them. He's hoping it's Ja Rule's daughter because they must be rich.

programme.title: Run's House: Rapper's Retreat
programme.desc: Rev receives guest passes to the Mohegan Sun in Connecticut. Justine doesn't want to go. Rev is proud of Jojo's recent recordings with Blackout and wants to reward him as a fellow rapper.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Haunted Piano
programme.desc: Ryan and the PRS team are called in when unlucky antique collectors unwittingly bring a paranormally-infested piano into their home. The team attempts to dismantle and destroy the offending instrument.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: The team are still spread thinly across this huge location and without the safety of numbers some of the investigators seem easy prey.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: The last part sees the team reach their limits as the spirits of this enormous location continue to emerge from the shadows. But will the enormity of the paranormal activity prove too much for the world-famous team.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.130
programme.desc: Man, after serving four years for robbery, accused of assaulting ex-girlfriend; his new girlfriend admits to breaking ex's car window/A teenager sues tow truck driver and car dealer for return of money paid for used Dodge Stratus.

programme.desc: Woman faces lawsuit for unpaid bail from speeding with suspended license. Man sues ex for car loan balance; she countersues for job loss.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Iconic Buildings
programme.desc: In construction, only a few buildings can be groundbreaking. Vastly different in shape, size, and function, these diverse buildings prove there is no recipe for greatness, just the fundamental ingredients of vision, bravery, and imagination.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswana’s Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coasts
programme.desc: Along coasts, one element ends and another begins. No two days are ever the same on a coastline: the only thing that remains a constant is the timeless power of the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: Arthur: War of the Worms/I Owe You One
programme.desc: Brain is always taking the fun out of Fern's storytelling by correcting her facts, but things gets out of hand when Fern tricks him with a fake story! Buster is always asking for favors. Will he learn the real meaning of friendship?

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Goes Nuts/Breezy Listening Blues
programme.desc: When Binky discovers that he's allergic to peanuts, he has so many questions, but learns that the best way not to go nuts is to be well informed and to understand his allergy. Much to his horror, Brain gets a "B-" on a test.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Gets Her Goose Cooked/Best of The Nest
programme.desc: Sue Ellen is the champion of the popular Internet game, Virtualgoose.com, but she’s become obsessed! And now the gang has moved onto Best of the Nest. Will any of his friends be willing to forgo their computers for a real, live adventure?

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella the Packrat/What's in a Name?
programme.desc: Prunella saves everything. Can Arthur help her break her packrat habits in time to put together the display for the school's Earth Day fair? Binky find out that his real name isn't Binky--it's Shelley?!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur The Wrecker/Arthur and The True Francine
programme.desc: Arthur always seems to wreck things, and this time it's Mom's computer. Can he get it fixed before Mom finds out? Then, Muffy A. Crosswire and Francine are absolute best friends, despite their rather obvious differences.

programme.title: Arthur: Making Conversation/A Cloudy Day
programme.desc: Talking to adults makes George want to hide! When he learns he must go to a grown-up party, he turns to his friends for help. Then, Arthur and his friends learn that old silent films can be just as much fun as the movies they’re used to.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Big Top Trouble/George Blows His Top
programme.desc: Francine is sure she will be a star at circus camp. How hard could it be? Then, George is always more than happy to lend his pals whatever they need. But Buster's borrowing gets out of control.

programme.title: Arthur: The Tattletale Frog/D.W. & Bud's Higher Purpose
programme.desc: When Bud is blamed for an accident D.W. causes, she has to decide whether to let her friend take the fall. D.W. and Bud can't wait to ride a new rollercoaster. Will they make it past the ticket taker, or will they come up short?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Secret Admirer/The Last King of Lambland
programme.desc: Buster receives a box of chocolates in the mail from a secret admirer. It's driving him crazy! Who could possibly like him that much? And James receives a gift from his uncle in Scotland--a toy lamb that will give its owner special powers!

programme.title: Arthur: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story/Sue Ellen Vegges Out
programme.desc: Fern has writer's block! Fortunately, Ladonna's full of stories, and Fern decides to "borrow" the tales and simply change the names. Then, when Sue Ellen decides to stop eating meat, Muffy and Francine compete to be the best vegetarian.

programme.title: Boy Soldiers Of World War II
programme.desc: In Britain during World War Two, thousands of men over the age of 18 were conscripted into the army, but among them were hundreds of underage boys, some as young as 15, who lied about their age so that they could join up.

programme.title: VE Day - Forever in their Debt
programme.desc: Tells the stories of those who experienced the end of the war in all its many forms. It features a wide range of interviews from children who remember the street parties, to the servicemen who remember not having to buy a single drink that day.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Building The Brand
programme.desc: Hitler’s fascination with propaganda was born in the trenches of the First World War. There he saw it emerge as a potent tool of psychological warfare - one that he would harness to build the Nazi movement. Witness Hitler's early propaganda tactics.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Power and Persuasion
programme.desc: This episode explores Hitler's approach to propaganda in power; where persuasion was achieved through propaganda and terror, all in service of one goal: the creation of a state under one shared ideology. A new German power fueled by propaganda.

programme.title: Hitler's Propaganda Machine: Why We Fight
programme.desc: This episode explores the way Hitler used propaganda to justify his warmongering, reframing it as defense of Germany’s people and borders. It investigates the role propaganda played for both Hitler and the Allies to mobilize their countries for war.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Paris enlists Nev and Max to help her figure out who has been catfishing her for the past four years. But as the guys investigate, they make a shocking discovery. (S5, ep11)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After months of intimate texts with Titus, a man she met online, Candice has decided to tell to her husband. But before she does, she asks Nev to help her find out who Titus really is! (S5, ep16)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Felipe & Jasmine
programme.desc: Single father Felipe is ready to settle down with Jasmine. However, the two have been talking online for eight months and have never met. Max returns and joins Nev to investigate.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Kailani has fallen for Sam, her gay friend's online ex-boyfriend. Sam claims to love Kailani, but has been acting strange since she has tried to meet up with him. Nev and Max investigate. (S6, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Mama doesn't always know best. Shuntay enlists the help of Nev and Max after her mum begins talking about marriage and uprooting her family to be with a man who refuses to meet in person. (S5, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Prophet & Trinity
programme.desc: While Prophet, of Grammy-nominated Nappy Roots, is making his rap career comeback, he connected online with Trinity. Prophet's ready to settle down, but is this beauty too good to be true? (S4, ep13)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Let's Make it Official
programme.desc: Jenni wonders where she stands with Roger and realises they might be in more trouble than she thought. Mike decides it is time for him to take his relationship with Paula to the next level. (S6, ep6)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Great Meatballs of Fire
programme.desc: Mike adjusts to being in a relationship and gets confused about the rules. Deena goes back to her meatball ways, but has to fight for her right to party. (S6, ep7)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Control the Crazy
programme.desc: Sammi confronts Deena about her meatball antics and the two of them go head-to-head. Mike and the roommates get to know Paula's wild side, and Mike isn't sure he can handle it. (S6, ep8)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Make it Unofficial
programme.desc: Jenni plans a 'Shore Shower' for Nicole and invites all the roommates. The guys support Mike's decision to dump Paula and tag along for a front row seat to all the action. (S6, ep9)

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 118
programme.desc: Danielle loves to laugh and joke with Chris, but now she wants to get serious with him. Jenni met Christie about a year ago and now she's ready to bare her heart.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 119
programme.desc: Nicole wants to make her best friend of a year and a half her boyfriend. Andrew and Sarah have been friends for 5 years now he's ready to reveal his true feelings.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 120
programme.desc: Franklin needs to let Erica, his friend of 5 years, know how he really feels about her. Wayne, a rapper, reveals his true feelings to Megan.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Killer Next Door

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Mortician, The Murder, The Movie

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Enemy Within

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Catch a Stalker
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Penny Chang of Shaker Heights, Ohio was stalked and killed by her older brother’s best friend, 21-year-old Scott Strothers.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ron Rudin, a wealthy real-estate developer disappeared from his home in Las Vegas, Nev. Later, the charred remains of his decapitated body were found in the desert. After a lengthy investigation police were convinced that Rudin’s wife was involved.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: TV of Tomorrow/Little Red Riding Egg/The Well Fed Feline
programme.desc: Jon buys a new TV set when his old one breaks./Orson decides to make his own movie./Animal activist thinks Garfield is starving.

programme.desc: The ancestor of one of the most hungry pirates sets sail. Philo is back to help give motivational speeches to the weasel and Wade.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.desc: Binky the Clown loses his show and gets a job fixing up Jon's house./The farm's talent show is disrupted when Orson's brothers show./Nermal thinks it is no longer the "world's cutest kitten."

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield relates the tale of a lousy Italian chef (Jon). The Buddy Bears present a cultural moment.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Psychic

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Survivors

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bonjour Barney!

programme.desc: Isaac (Ted Lange) finds himself in a precarious position when he meets a beautiful former school chum (Bernadette Stanis) and her macho husband (Clifton Davis).

programme.title: Melrose Place: No Bed of Roses

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Nature Calls
programme.desc: Everyone spends a weekend in Vermont to watch the leaves change. During the trip, Adam gets poison ivy on his hands, Jeff has an embarrassing experience on the inn's computer, and Liz begins to realize that her marriage is a sham.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Shy Dial
programme.desc: Jeff uses an app on his phone that automatically puts his calls through to Audrey's voicemail. Meanwhile, Adam befriends a clothing salesman who helps him against his friends when he picks up some questionable clothing choices.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Chair
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey engage in a battle of wills when she refuses to admit that she hates the armchair she ordered while Jeff pretends to love it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy's help in finding it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: After The Lovin'
programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Jesse is roped into a deadly undercover mission by his estranged father, who is working against Eckhart.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A young New Mutant from Adam's past shows up, seeking revenge for her father's death.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team encounters a mutant who kills other mutants by draining their energy and can also come back to life after being killed.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Emma reunites with an old friend who possesses telecyber powers. The reunion turns dangerous, however, when Michelle tries to turn Emma over to the GSA.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Adam is framed for murder by a New Mutant with the ability to steal people's memories.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A mutant with telepathic abilities who can make people experience, mentally, anything he wants manages to get into the minds of Mutant X. Now he is making them experience their worst fears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Once and Future World
programme.desc: Artifacts believed to be Taelon are found in South America. Renee and Liam try to beat Sandoval to the source to determine the importance of the found pieces.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Thicker than Blood
programme.desc: An old business partner of Augur's is hired by Da'an to get information about the Resistance, resulting in the death of many members. Meanwhile, Sandoval finds out he has a life threatening blood disorder.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Little Bit of Heaven
programme.desc: Liam and Renee investigate a dead pregnant woman missing her fetus. They discover a town that Da'an helped after a nuclear meltdown and a suspicious brother and sister who were part of an early experiment to combine human and Taelon DNA.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pad'ar
programme.desc: Pad'ar is a fierce battle game where spectators can connect via a "jack patch" that Liam suspects is causing neurological damage to users. When a Pad'ar warrior dies, it raises even more questions about the safety.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: In Memory
programme.desc: Lili wakes up, supposedly on Earth after a coma, and is told the Jaridians have come and conquered the Taelons. She remembers Sandoval telling her she no longer has and Earth-based physiology and believes things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Cloister
programme.desc: Zo'or and Da'an travel to a cloister for an energy sharing ceremony, but one of the sisters is killed and everyone is a suspect.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Pirate's Curse
programme.desc: A seismic event opens the earth and send Marguerite and Roxton into a pit, where they discover a pirate's buried treasure...and his bones. A curse on the booty complicates matters.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Visitor
programme.desc: After Malone is attacked by a beast, he and Veronica meet her old friend Danu, who has also been injured. Danu goes missing, and the group travels to his village learning he is a werewolf.

programme.title: The Lost World: A Man of Vision
programme.desc: The five adventurers all experience visions of Summerlee, the companion they had presumed dead after he disappeared into a waterfall. They suffer injury and face danger as they pursue the vision.

programme.title: The Lost World: Into the Fire
programme.desc: The incredible occurs when a Navy airship flies over the plateau. Malone manages to climb aboard, but is ambushed once inside and meets the deceptive Captain Askwith.

programme.title: The Lost World: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Marguerite, Roxton, and Challenger take the place of Askwith aboard his ghost ship and return to the day of its fatal departure in 1915. Back on the Plateau, Veronica chases down Askwith.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Travelers
programme.desc: Malone remains missing, and the explorers' search party crosses paths with a trio of travelers. Marguerite becomes taken with the dashing leader, especially when he offers her a way off the Plateau.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Actor and explorer Brian Blessed takes to the road with comedian Jenny Eclair accompanied by James Braxton and Anita Manning. They begin in Cockermouth and head south through Cumbria, ending up at an auction showdown in Runcorn.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Master of bowling spin Phil Tufnell battles it out with BBC Breakfast's sports presenter Chris Hollins for the best deals on antiques. Philip Serrell and Thomas Plant are on hand to advise as they tour the southeast toward auction in London.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Bond girls Honor Blackman and Britt Ekland hit the road in their Aston Martin to relive some 007 classics with Charlie Ross and Charles Hanson. They're out to make a profit as they roar toward an auction in Greenwich, London.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Father and son team Dan and Peter Snow go head-to-head with Charlie Ross and Charles Hanson on the hunt for the best antique deals as they travel through Hampshire and along the south coast, ending at an auction in Billingshurst, Sussex.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Sir Terry Wogan and Caroline Quentin add a touch of class as they seek profits to donate to Children In Need. In a classic 1948 Jaguar MK 4 they tour Oxfordshire with Charlie Ross and Charles Hanson toward a showdown in Chiswick, London.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Amber and Ste's weekend away doesn't go to plan. Chloe lets rip about Jordan's lads holiday. Megan regrets rejecting a thoughtful gesture from Dylan's girlfriend. Shannon stands her ground. (S6, ep3)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Ste can't hold his tongue at Brooklyn's party. Chloe grills Jordan about his lads trip. Megan summons Dylan's girlfriend for a chat. Sassi has her braces off but has nothing to smile about. (S6, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Sassi launches 'Sassi's Salon'. Chloe decides she wants to be a midwife but Jordan has doubts. Megan finds out a secret about Dylan. Shannon lets her insecurities get the better of her. (S6, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jordan & Austin
programme.desc: After two years of chatting, Jordan believes Austin is the one. But every time they arrange to meet, Austin cancels. Can Julie and Oobah finally bring them together? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Rob & Sarah
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Nathan Henry to help Rob track down his soulmate, Sarah. After two and a half years, Sarah has suddenly gone quiet and it's up to Oobah and Nathan to investigate. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Temptation in Texas
programme.desc: A report about the 2011 shooting death of Greg Williams, and the question of whether he was killed with his own gun by an intruder inside his suburban Dallas home - as his wife Michele Williams has claimed - or if Michele herself was guilty of the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Killing Fields
programme.desc: A report about a desolate strip of land between Houston and Galveston where over 30 young women and girls have disappeared or have been murdered.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Stranger You Know
programme.desc: A report about Marti Hill, who was savagely beaten in her Prairie Village, Kansas home. She was found by police barely breathing and covered in blood.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Every Picture Tells A Story
programme.desc: On February 15, 2009, Cathy McNaughton was stabbed to death in her home in Sharpsburg, Georgia. The day had started with her husband Alec serving her breakfast in bed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Guilty Until Proven Innocent
programme.desc: Two men convicted for a brutal rape they say they didn’t commit, and DNA evidence backs them up. How did a law professor, her students and new DNA technology play a part in the case?

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper questions Dr. Jacoby, who suspects Leo Johnson is the killer. Cooper's supervisor, Gordon Cole, calls in with Albert's report. Josie Packard spies on Ben Horne and Catherine Martell. Hawk tracks down the One Armed Man.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper and company have tea with the Log Lady. The Log Lady tells them there was a third man following after Leo and Jacques the night Laura died. At Jacques Renault's cabin Cooper, Hawk, and Truman find Waldo the bird.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Audrey cons her way into working at the perfume counter where Laura worked. She discovers that it's being used as a recruitment post for One Eyed Jacks. James, Donna and Maddy plan to lure Jacoby away from his office.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Audrey is hired at One Eyed Jacks, but is caught in a trap when her father arrives. Cooper gets Jacques Renault to reveal the details of Laura's last night in the cabin. Deputy Andy saves Truman's life and apprehends Renault.
